p: Among the 411 participants with pol sequences, ten (2.4%) were identified as harbouring SDRMs. As shown in Table 3, 0.5% (2/411), 1.2% (5/411), and 0.7% (3/411) of the sequences harboured SDRMs to nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitors (NRTIs), non-nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitors (NNRTIs), and protease inhibitors (PIs), respectively. As shown in Table 4, the prevalence of SDRMs increased with age (trend χ 2 = 4.739, p = 0.033).
